page.title: 02VILLAGE SURVEY
page.content: We did a survey of every house in Yeaveley. We sent out 72 forms and got back 66 that is 92%. We discovered that:{Of the people:} 19% work in the village 61% work outside the village 20% are retired 20% of the workers are farmers {Of the houses: 23% are under 10 years old 39% are from 10 to 50 years old 4% are from 50 to 100 years old 24% are from 100 to 200 years old 9% are over 200 years 17% have changed their use in some way {Of the families: 47% have lived here for under 10 years 32% have lived here from 10 to 50 yrs 21% have lived here over 50 years 68% have had someone who attended the village school at some time.
